Service Details: - Maintains a toll-free, province-wide, confidential, free helpline that offers compassionate listening and referrals for individuals suffering from grief and bereavement - Volunteers are familiar with over 300 grief support services in 85 communities in British Columbia
Languages: English ; Grief and loss brochures also available in Spanish, Punjabi, Tagalog (Philipino), Chinese, Vietnamese, Korean and Persian
